title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Small Public Service Vehicle
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Small Public Service Vehicle 

(Emergency Measure Covid-19) (Expired Licence) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited small public service vehicle (emergency measure covid-19) (expired licence) regulation 2021

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Taxi Regulation
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Taxi Regulation 

(Small Public Service Vehicle) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 33 of 2015).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean taxi regulation (small public service vehicle) regulation 2015 (s.i no 33 2015)

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: In these Regulations, “Covid-19” means a disease caused by infection
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations, “Covid-19” means a disease caused by infection 
with the virus SARS-CoV-2 and specified as an infectious disease in accordance 
with Regulation 6 of, and the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations 
1981 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981) or any variant of the disease so specified as an 
infectious disease in those Regulations.
text_norm: 3 regulation covid-19 mean disease caused infection virus sars-cov-2 specified infectious disease accordance regulation 6 schedule infectious disease regulation 1981 (s.i no 390 1981) variant disease specified infectious disease regulation

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: 4. These Regulations shall be deemed to have come into operation on the
text_raw:
4. These Regulations shall be deemed to have come into operation on the 

13 March 2021.
text_norm: 4 regulation shall deemed come operation 13 march 2021

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: 5. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting at Regulation 17
text_raw:
5. The Principal Regulations are amended by substituting at Regulation 17 

(2)(a) “twenty four” for “twelve”. 

GIVEN under the Seal of the National Transport Authority, 

16 July 2021. 

FRED BARRY, 

Chairperson, National Transport Authority. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [363] 3

title: provision, having regard to the Covid-19 pandemic, and in order to mitigate the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of the Small Public Service Vehicle (Emergency Measure 
Covid-19) (Expired Licence) Regulations 2021 is to amend Regulation 17 to 
extend the period for application for a replacement licence by the holder of a 
small public service vehicle licence that has expired to 24 months. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [363]
